channel.title: Trade
channel.description: how do i make a command where only the part of staff that can trade is the owner and no admins and co owners and mods caN TRADE how do i get a command for that looked everywhere

item.title: Trade
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

look for

if(other.interfaceOpened){ int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return;
than add

if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(other.playerRights == 1){ sM("mod cannot trade"); return; } if(playerRights == 1){ sM("mod cannot trade"); return; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("########")) { sM("that noob has trading dissabled by the owner"); return; }
change the ####with the playername.

gl

Read full topic
